SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AnimationController
Manages the game's automatic falling animation timeline.
Board
Interface defining the core operations of a Tetris game board.
Brick
Interface representing a Tetris brick (tetromino).
BrickGenerator
 
BrickRotator
Manages the rotation of a Tetris brick.
ClearRow
Data class representing the result of a row clearing operation.
ColorMapper
Maps integer values to colors for Tetris blocks.
DownData
Data class wrapping the result of a "move down" operation.
EventSource
Enumeration of the possible sources that can trigger a game event.
EventType
Enumeration of the types of move events that can occur in the game.
GameConstants
Holds all the constant values used throughout the game.
GameController
Manages the core game logic and coordinates interactions between the model (Board) and the view (GuiController).
GameOverPanel
Panel displayed when the game is over.
GuiController
Controller for the main game GUI (JavaFX).
InputEventListener
Interface for handling input events that affect the game state.
InputHandler
Handles keyboard input for the Tetris game.
InputHandler.BrickDisplayUpdater
Interface for updating the brick display after input events.
LeaderboardManager
Singleton manager for the game's leaderboard.
LockDelayManager
Manages the lock delay timer for the Tetris game.
Main
The entry point of the Tetris application.
MainMenuController
Controller for the Main Menu screen.
MatrixOperations
Utility class for performing matrix operations on the game board.
MoveEvent
Represents a movement event in the game.
NextShapeInfo
 
NotificationPanel
A temporary notification panel that displays text (e.g., score bonus) on the screen.
PausePanel
Panel displayed when the game is paused.
PlayerScore
 
PreviewPanel
View component responsible for displaying the "Next Pieces" preview.
RandomBrickGenerator
Generates random Tetris bricks using a bag system or random selection.
Score
Represents the player's score in the game.
ScoreView
View component responsible for displaying the score and high score.
SettingsDialog
Utility class for displaying the Settings dialog.
SimpleBoard
Default implementation of the Board interface.
SoundManager
Centralized sound manager for the application.
ViewData
Immutable data class containing all information required to render the game state.
WallKickData
Data provider for the Super Rotation System (SRS) wall kicks.
